reviewText: Well I'd never have paid for this garbage if I'd known about the poor quality of this product. If someone has the program than the tutorial inside is much more useful for "Self Training" than, what is comming with this DVD. Are you considering for purchase a video tutorial for MAYA than I'd recommend you to check out Digital Tutors.com or VTC.com.

This is a decent training video. You will need to turn the volume up and be able to understand English spoken with a second language accent. The information is pretty good and to the point. The instructor makes the tools seem easy to learn.
